meanings.definition: Being extremely knowledgeable or enthusiastic about a particular subject, often to the point of being socially awkward.
meanings.sent1: She is the geekiest person in our class, always talking about computers.
meanings.sent2: The geekiest student in school spends all day coding and playing video games.
meanings.sent3: At the party, the geekiest guest brought a detailed presentation on quantum physics.
meanings.sent4: His geekiest trait is his ability to recite every line from every Star Wars movie.
meanings.sent5: The geekiest bookworm you'll ever meet, she devours science fiction novels in a day.

meanings.definition: The most geeky or nerdy in a group or situation.
meanings.sent1: He was voted the geekiest of the group due to his vast comic book collection.
meanings.sent2: The geekiest among us always has the latest tech gadgets before anyone else.
meanings.sent3: The geekiest at the convention wore a full superhero costume, cape and all.
meanings.sent4: In the office, she proudly embraces her title as the geekiest employee.
meanings.sent5: The geekiest of all his friends, he can debate the best sci-fi movies for hours.
